title: 5/2/17 - Ajit Pai, Christina Hoff Sommers and Steve Deace Join Glenn
description:
Stephen Colbert's weird rant for President Trump ...The president's awkward interview with CBS ...Samantha Bee talks about Glenn with Mother Jones ...Christina Hoff Sommers corrects the record on feminist lies ...FCC Chairman Ajit Pai & the future of net neutrality ...How do small companies compete against communications giants?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
